BR.name: Minimize System Administration
BR.description: the tasks of managing large numbers of accounts is beyond the capabilities of SHPO staff and therefor much thought should be given to minimizing or eliminating the need to have a system administrator interact with accounts. Adminstrators should be used to configure the software application, load to test environment, load to production environment.

BR.name: Logging
BR.description: Documents created collaboratively between Citizens (pubic) and the State of Michigan (gov) should be considerd legal documents. Logging is important to the determination of responsible parties and contribution to the written documents.

BR.name: Access Restriction
BR.description: SHPO is required by federal law to restrict access to Archaeology sites and the State of Michigan requires actor access to limited exactly those privilges required to perform the task. Access to system, system interfaces, and data should be controlled from the perspective of each actor's tasks, rights and privileges.

BR.name: Seperation of Duties
BR.description: Seperating who performs which task is important to system security and to limit the exploitation of Federal and State funding sources. At the highest level seperation of duties falls into two catigories: Public and Government. Opportunities to seperate duties should be exersized in system architecture and interface designs to minimize the potential to exploit normal system function for illegal purposes.

Indirect-Requirement.name: Header
Indirect-Requirement.description: Provide a header graphic that Identifies SHPO, MSHDA, and the State of Michigan. Work with SHPO staff to prepare this graphic.

description.line: DA, and the State of Mich

Indirect-Requirement.name: Title
Indirect-Requirement.description: Provide a title that reflects the focus of the screen.

description.line: ects the focus of the scr

Indirect-Requirement.name: Navigation
Indirect-Requirement.description: Provide actor methods to navigate the system.

Indirect-Requirement.name: Introduction
Indirect-Requirement.description: Provide shortish introduction for each screen of the system.

description.line: tion for each screen of t

Indirect-Requirement.name: Body
Indirect-Requirement.description: Provide a body area to focus on screen's purpose

description.line: Provide a body area to fo

Indirect-Requirement.name: Footer
Indirect-Requirement.description: Provide a State of Michigan footer.

Indirect-Requirement.name: Multi-Process
Indirect-Requirement.description: Provide a system that drives and controls one and more data collection/review processes.

Indirect-Requirement.name: Task-Driven
Indirect-Requirement.description: Provide specific tasks for each actor customized to the current activity as a primary method to move through a process. Tasks replace the need to memorize process steps and simplify the user experience and interface.

Indirect-Requirement.name: Action-Descriptive
Indirect-Requirement.description: Provide Activity logging for all process and system activities, Display Activities within the scope of each actors permissions and access level. We should know that person V pressed button W from screen X on day Y and time Z. We should know that Person X was granted permissions by system on day Y at Time Z.

ould know that person V p
en X on day Y and time Z.
ons by system on day Y at

Indirect-Requirement.name: Audit-Oriented
Indirect-Requirement.description: Provide audit logging for all data changes. We should know that person A changed column U in table V from W to X on day Y at time Z.

description.line: uld know that person A ch
anged column U in table V
from W to X on day Y at

Indirect-Requirement.name: Multi-User
Indirect-Requirement.description: Provide access for 25 concurent SHPO staff via an internet install for reviews, and user, process and system management

Indirect-Requirement.name: Privileges
Indirect-Requirement.description: Provide methods to have actors request privileges by providing small amounts of information. I.e., to gain/collect privileges to register the actor must give a name, an email and a password. Once the information is submitted then the user is granted privileges to do the next step.

description.line: st give a name, an email

Indirect-Requirement.name: Securtiy
Indirect-Requirement.description: Secure all system access points, and servers. Secure data transport, Secure data content, Prevent unauthorized access.

Indirect-Requirement.name: Access-Point-Internet
Indirect-Requirement.description: for public

Indirect-Requirement.name: Access-Point-Intranet
Indirect-Requirement.description: for govenment, isolate admin functions to intranet

Constraint.name: Browser-Only
Constraint.description: Systems that require special client software installs will be rejected based on our inability to support such a delivery system.

description.line: d on our inability to sup

Indirect-Requirement.name: Storage
Indirect-Requirement.description: Provide a system that creates, reads, updates, and deletes system data, process data, geographic data .

Indirect-Requirement.name: Collection
Indirect-Requirement.description: Provide Screens and data collecting controls and components to collect text/files/images/geographic coordinates in a coordinated/logical/configurable manner.

Indirect-Requirement.name: Extendable
Indirect-Requirement.description: Provide a system that is extendable to run one and more processes. Includes ability to create processes of one or more screens.

description.line: ses of one or more screen

Indirect-Requirement.name: Configurable
Indirect-Requirement.description: Provide a system that can be customized to create/modify processes and process components readily and logically.

Indirect-Requirement.name: Manageable
Indirect-Requirement.description: Provide a system that is configurable and can be modified and adapted to an environment where the norm includes deployment process as a progression of steps and different physical environments before an a system or system changes are deployed to a production environment. (i.e., from process development, to process testing, to process quality assurance, to production envirnment.

description.line: an a system or system cha
nges are deployed to a pr

Indirect-Requirement.name: Geographic
Indirect-Requirement.description: Provide a system that supports Geographic Information collection/editing/display/geocoding for one or more geographic feature sets/files.

Indirect-Requirement.name: Initiate
Indirect-Requirement.description: Provide a method to intiate the opening of a dialog.

description.line: te the opening of a dialo

Indirect-Requirement.name: Function
Indirect-Requirement.description: Provide a dialog to facilitate the interaction between an actor and system.

Indirect-Requirement.name: Show
Indirect-Requirement.description: Provide a method to display the dialog overlain on current/parent screen.

Indirect-Requirement.name: Close
Indirect-Requirement.description: Provide a method to close the dialog.

Indirect-Requirement.name: Function
Indirect-Requirement.description: Provide a method to execute the dialog's primary function.

Indirect-Requirement.name: Results
Indirect-Requirement.description: Provide a method to show results in the current/parent screen.

Indirect-Requirement.name: Success
Indirect-Requirement.description: On successful completion of the dialogs primary function, the dialog must close automatically.

Constraint.name: Dialog-Constraint
Constraint.description: In the case of web browsers, a dialog should not be presented by opening a new browser.

description.line: In the case of web browse
rs, a dialog should not b

Indirect-Requirement.name: Function
Indirect-Requirement.description: Provide a method to perform a keyword or short phrase search.

description.line: rm a keyword or short phr

Non-Functional-Requirement.name: Dialog
Non-Functional-Requirement.description: Provide the following requirements in the context of keyword searches

Indirect-Requirement.name: Results
Indirect-Requirement.description: Provide a method to show/put search results into the current/parent screen's List.

Indirect-Requirement.name: Validation
Indirect-Requirement.description: Provide a method to block searches with empty/spaces-only and single character searches.

Indirect-Requirement.name: Result-Success
Indirect-Requirement.description: Provide methods to return one or more search rows to the current/parent screen's List.

Indirect-Requirement.name: Search-Result-Fail
Indirect-Requirement.description: Provide methods to return a 'No search results found' message when no search-results are found.

Non-Functional-Requirement.name: Log
Non-Functional-Requirement.description: Provide the following requirements in the context of keyword searches

Indirect-Requirement.name: Function
Indirect-Requirement.description: Provide a method to display tabulal data (i.e., columns and rows), links, buttons, images.

Indirect-Requirement.name: Titles
Indirect-Requirement.description: Provide a method to display titles for each colunn of the List.

Indirect-Requirement.name: Order-Default
Indirect-Requirement.description: Set default order of list by the first column value.

Indirect-Requirement.name: Order-Default-Reset
Indirect-Requirement.description: Provide a method to reset the list order to the default.

description.line: the list order to the de

Indirect-Requirement.name: Order-By-Title
Indirect-Requirement.description: Provide a method to sort list by Title. Prefer to click on title to initiate sort.

Indirect-Requirement.name: Row-Limit
Indirect-Requirement.description: Provide a method to limit the number of rows displayed in the list to 15.

Indirect-Requirement.name: Row-Limit-Data
Indirect-Requirement.description: Provide a method to limit the data to that which the current actor has permissions.

description.line: the data to that which t

Indirect-Requirement.name: Navigate
Indirect-Requirement.description: Provide a method to navigate through List when there are more rows than the limit.

description.line: re are more rows than the

Indirect-Requirement.name: Search-Permissions-Actor
Indirect-Requirement.description: Provide a method to limit searching to the permissions of the current actor and the scope of his or her records.

description.line: and the scope of his or

Indirect-Requirement.name: Search-Permissions-Actor-Proxy
Indirect-Requirement.description: Provide a method to limit searching to the permissions of the current actor-proxy and the scope of the actor to which this proxy is bound.

description.line: he actor to which this pr

Indirect-Requirement.name: Request
Indirect-Requirement.description: Give an actor the ability to login to the system.

Indirect-Requirement.name: Credentials
Indirect-Requirement.description: Login requires an email addresss and password. Credentials are compared to those found in table Registrants.

Indirect-Requirement.name: Log
Indirect-Requirement.description: Log Successfull login requests in Activies-Log. Do not store password.

Indirect-Requirement.name: Limit
Indirect-Requirement.description: Limit specific actor to 3 unsuccessful request in a row. Attempts over 3 should be directed to Public-Request-Password.

Indirect-Requirement.name: Request
Indirect-Requirement.description: Give an actor the ability to request account privileges.

Indirect-Requirement.name: Function
Indirect-Requirement.description: Provide privileges to access parts/components/data of system specific to requested privileges.

Indirect-Requirement.name: Task
Indirect-Requirement.description: Provide a task to prompt actor to initiate this privilege request. Prefer a system generated task placed in the task list once an account is established.

description.line: aced in the task list onc

Indirect-Requirement.name: Request
Indirect-Requirement.description: Provide a dialog to explain the privileges and provide method to send the request.

description.line: vide method to send the r

Indirect-Requirement.name: Task-Duration
Indirect-Requirement.description: Remove specific privilege request once privileges have been granted.

Indirect-Requirement.name: Request-Log
Indirect-Requirement.description: Log the request for this privilege in the Activity-Log

Indirect-Requirement.name: Grant
Indirect-Requirement.description: Grant privileges automatically upon request.

Indirect-Requirement.name: Grant-Log
Indirect-Requirement.description: Log the granting of privileges in the Activity-Log

Indirect-Requirement.name: Limit
Indirect-Requirement.description: Limit requested privilege to one per actor.Limit specific actor requests-for-password to 5 per day or provide suitable method to limit robo requests.

Indirect-Requirement.name: Function
Indirect-Requirement.description: Pokes serve to keep the system moving by turning over system monitoring to the community of system actors

Indirect-Requirement.description: Provide an actor with the ability to poke another actor.

Indirect-Requirement.description: Log pokes in the Activity-Log.

Non-Functional-Requirement.name: Home-Screen Screen-Title
Non-Functional-Requirement.description: All screens should be titled and the title should appear on the screen.

Functional-Requirement.description: Provide an Task-Log list to store tasks specific to actors.

Functional-Requirement.description: Provide the system with the ability to poke all SHPO staff when new NRHP-PQ,NRHP,TAX,ER is requested.

Functional-Requirement.name: Escalation
Functional-Requirement.description: Provide standard methods to define, create, read, update, configure, and delete Escalations.

Functional-Requirement.description: Provide multiple escalation steps, messages, and ...

Functional-Requirement.name: Escalation-Config-Timing
Functional-Requirement.description: Provide methods to configure timing of escalation steps.

Functional-Requirement.description: Store: owner, recipient, message, date, time, access-point

Functional-Requirement.description: Provide method

Functional-Requirement.description: Log notifications in activity log. Store owner, recipient, message, date, time, p

Functional-Requirement.name: Notification-Logging-Storage
Functional-Requirement.description: Store owner, recipient, message, date, time, p

Functional-Requirement.name: Validate-Data
Functional-Requirement.description: Validate all data submitted to the system for proper type, size, requirement, SQL injection.

description.line: ed to the system for prop

Functional-Requirement.name: Public-Guest-Privileges
Functional-Requirement.description: Guest Privileges allow an actor to submit Public-Login-Requests, Public-Request-Passwords, or Public-Privilege-Requests.

Functional-Requirement.name: Public-Guest-Privilege-Duration
Functional-Requirement.description: Grant temporary Guest Privileges to every visitor.

Functional-Requirement.name: Public-Guest-Login
Functional-Requirement.description: Guests to the public site are automatically logged in as using a guest rights and privileges.

description.line: in as using a guest righ

Functional-Requirement.name: Public-Guest-Login-Logging
Functional-Requirement.description: Do not log guest logins.

Functional-Requirement.name: Public-Account
Functional-Requirement.description: A Public-Account stores minimal information about an actor. Store: Legal name, email, password.

Non-Functional-Requirement.name: Public-Account-Privileges
Non-Functional-Requirement.description: Account-Privileges allow an actor to create, access, and update a registration form.

Functional-Requirement.name: Public-Account-Privilege-Request
Functional-Requirement.description: Provide an actor the ability/task to request Account-Privileges. Collect an actor's legal name , email, and a password, and access-point.

description.line: il, and a password, and a

Functional-Requirement.name: Public-Account-Privilege-Request-Limit
Functional-Requirement.description: Limit accounts to one per actor. Provide methodogy to limit any robo-requests from hackers.

Functional-Requirement.name: Public-Account-Privilege-Request-Duplications
Functional-Requirement.description: Provide methodogy to prevent duplicate accounts. Use full name and email to define a unique account.

description.line: se full name and email to

Functional-Requirement.name: Public-Account-Privilege-Request-Logging
Functional-Requirement.description: Log successful Public-Account-Privilege-Requests in Activity Log. Store message, identity of actor, date, time, and access point

Functional-Requirement.name: Public-Account-Privilege-Grant
Functional-Requirement.description: Grant Account-Privileges automatically on successful Account-Privilege-Request.

Functional-Requirement.name: Public-Account-Privilege-Grant-Logging
Functional-Requirement.description: Log successful Public-Account-Privilege-Grant in an Activity Log. Store message, identity of actor, date, time, and access point

Functional-Requirement.name: Public-Account-Privilege-Duration
Functional-Requirement.description: Duration of Account Privileges limited to one year from year. Start year clock from the date and time of last account holder activity.

description.line: ock from the date and tim

Functional-Requirement.name: Public-Account-Privilege-Deactivation
Functional-Requirement.description: Deactivate Accounts by marking the account as inactive, and revoke all privileges. Retain the account is record for historical and auditing purposes. An account is eligable for deactification when the account has had at least one successful submisson to any one of the SHPO programs. Purge all associated and incomplete submissions.

description.line: to any one of the SHPO p

Functional-Requirement.name: Public-Account-Privilege-Deactivation-Logging
Functional-Requirement.description: Log successful Public-Account-Privilege-Deactivation in an Activity Log. Store message, identity of actor, date, time, and access point

description.line: on in an Activity Log. St

Functional-Requirement.name: Public-Account-Privilege-Deactivation-Notification
Functional-Requirement.description: Notify actor when an account is deactivated by send email. Store message, identity of actor, date, time, and access point

Functional-Requirement.name: Public-Account-Privilege-Reactivation-Logging
Functional-Requirement.description: Log successful Public-Account-Privilege-Reactivation in an Activity Log. Store message, identity of actor, date, time, and access point

description.line: on in an Activity Log. St

Functional-Requirement.name: Public-Account-Privilege-Deletion
Functional-Requirement.description: Delete an Account by removing the account from the system and revoking privileges. An account is eligible for deletion when inactivity has exceded one year and the account has had no successful submissions to any of the SHPO programs. Purge assocated registration information, all incomplete submissions. Retain log entries.

description.line: sions to any of the SHPO

Functional-Requirement.name: Public-Account-Privilege-Deletion-Notification
Functional-Requirement.description: Notify actor when an account is deleted by sending email. Store message, identity of actor, date, time, and access point

Functional-Requirement.name: Public-Account-Privilege-Deletion-Logging
Functional-Requirement.description: Log successful Public-Account-Privilege-Deletion in activities and audit logs. Store message, identity of actor, date, time, and access point

Functional-Requirement.name: Public-Account-Privilege-Inactivity-Escalation
Functional-Requirement.description: Escalate account inactivity. Two months prior to deactivation of an account send an email notice; one month prior send second notice email; 24 hours before expiration send final notification.

description.line: ty. Two months prior to d

Functional-Requirement.name: Public-Account-Privilege-Inactivity-Escalation-Logging
Functional-Requirement.description: Log Escalation notifications in Activity-Log. Store activity, message, owner-identity, recipient-identity, date, time, access-point

Non-Functional-Requirement.name: Public-Registrant-Privileges
Non-Functional-Requirement.description: Privileges to request additonal privileges such as Public-NRHP-Privileges, Public-Request-ER-Privileges, Public-Request-LM-Privileges, Public-Request-TAX-Privileges from a public access point.

Non-Functional-Requirement.name: Public-NRHP-Privileges
Non-Functional-Requirement.description: Public-NRHP-Privileges allow an actor to Initiate National Register Nominations from a public access point.

Functional-Requirement.name: Public-NRHP-Privileges-Request
Functional-Requirement.description: Provide an actor with the ability/task to request National Registration Privileges.

Functional-Requirement.name: Public-NRHP-Privileges-Request-Logging
Functional-Requirement.description: Log successful Public-NRHP-Privilege-Request. Store message, identity of actor, date, time, and access point

Functional-Requirement.name: Public-NRHP-Privileges-Grant
Functional-Requirement.description: Automatically grant National Register Privileges when request is recieved.

Functional-Requirement.name: Public-NRHP-Privileges-Grant-Logging
Functional-Requirement.description: Log successful Public-NRHP-Privileges-Grant. Store message, identity of actor, date, time, and access point

Non-Functional-Requirement.name: Public-NRHP-Editor-Privileges
